sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-autocomplete
    :clearable="!readonly"
    v-model="selectedValue"
    :items="items"
    :menu-props="{ bottom: true, offsetY: true }"
    :hint="hint"
    persistent-hint
    :search-input.sync="search"
    :loading="loading"
    hide-selected
    hide-no-data
    :placeholder="placeholder"
    :rules="[rules.required]"
    :return-object="returnObject"
    :label="label"
    :readonly="readonly"
    :disabled="disabled"
    :validate-on-blur="validate_on_blur ? validate_on_blur : false"
    @change="$emit('change')"
  >
  </v-autocomplete>
</template>
<script>
import validationRules from "../mixins/validationRules";

export default {
  components: {},
  props: {
    returnObject: {
      type: Boolean,
      default: false,
    },
    readonly: {
      type: Boolean,
      default: false,
    },
    isMaterial: {
      type: Boolean,
      default: false,
    },
    disabled: {
      type: Boolean,
      default: false,
    },
    searchStore: null,
    validate_on_blur: null,
    displayText: null,
    getStore: null,
    listItemsToEdit: null,
    value: null,
    hint: null,
    placeholder: null,
    label: null,
    displayAutoComplete: null,
    editMode: null,
  },
  data: () => ({
    search: "",
    items: [],
    loading: false,
    select: null,
  }),
  computed: {
    selectedValue: {
      get() {
        if (this.value && (!this.items || this.items.length == 0)) {
          this.loadItem();
        }
        if (this.listItemsToEdit) {
          this.loadItem();
        }
        return this.value;
      },
      set(val) {
        if (!this.isMaterial) this.$emit("input", val);
        else {
          this.$emit("input", val.value);
        }
      },
    },
    display: {
      get() {
        return this.displayAutoComplete;
      },
    },
  },
  watch: {
    search(val) {
      val &&
        val.length >= 3 &&
        !this.items.find((x) => x.text == val) &&
        this.querySelections(val);
    },

    display() {
      this.items = [];
    },
  },
  methods: {
    async loadItem() {
      if (!this.getStore) return;
      let response = await this.getStore(this.value);
      if (response) this.items = [response];
    },
    async querySelections(v) {
      this.loading = true;
      let response = await this.searchStore(v);
      this.items = response;
      this.loading = false;
    },
  },

  mixins: [validationRules],
};
</script>
